text: The idea is that there is a kind of memory in nature. Each kind of thing has a collective memory. So, take a squirrel living in New York now. That squirrel is being influenced by all past squirrels.
author: Rupert Sheldrake

text: Nature chooses who will be transgender individuals don't choose this.
author: Mercedes Ruehl

text: Learn from me, if not by my precepts, then by my example, how dangerous is the pursuit of knowledge and how much happier is that man who believes his native town to be the world than he who aspires to be greater than his nature will allow.
author: Mary Wollstonecraft

text: If you can't be in awe of Mother Nature, there's something wrong with you.
author: Alex Trebek

text: The nature of the global business environment guarantees that no matter how hard we work to create a stable and healthy organisation, our organisation will continue to experience dramatic changes far beyond our control.
author: Margaret J. Wheatley
